boardgame.name: Puzzle Strike Shadows
boardgame.description: Puzzle Strike Shadows is the standalone expansion to Puzzle Strike (3rd Edition). You can play it by itself or combine it with the base set. The expansion contains 10 new characters, 24 new puzzle chips, as well as:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Panic Time rule to prevent games from going too long_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A 3-player and 4-player mode with no player elimination and that allows crashing your gems to whoever you want_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A 2v2 Team Battle Mode_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Custom Clockwork mode to draft your own character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Puzzle chips and character chips updated to ensure healthy competitive play in tournaments_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New components: game boards and screens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Puzzle Strike is a card game played with cardboard chips instead of cards that simulates a puzzle video game such as Puzzle Fighter or Tetris._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It's a deckbuilding game, which means you build your deck *as* you play the game. Every game is different because the bank starts with a different set of chips each time. Also, there are 10 characters to choose from in the base set, each with different gameplay. Between all that, there are over 411 MILLION starting conditions in a 4-player game, and even more if you include the expansion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A built-in comeback mechanic means that when you're on the edge of losing, you're also able to do even more combos than usual._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You don't have to worry about shuffling cards because you just put your cardboard tokens in a bag and shake them up to shuffle! Plus, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s pretty ballin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; to play a game with chips. Play it on your yacht, impress potential mates, etc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Though the game is fun even if you're terrible at it, it's also balanced for high level play by veteran asymmetric game balancer David Sirlin (Street Fighter HD Remix, Puzzle Fighter HD Remix, Kongai, Yomi, and Flash Duel)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Puzzle Strike (Third Edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Extra Kickstarter copy of Puzzle Strike (Third Edition) (£35.00) AND Puzzle Strike Shadows (£35.00). Comes with all Kickstarter perks - strategy guide, randomisers and the five extra promos chips (£5.00). £75.00 for the whole bundle. Please contact me for more information. Sealed in wrap, unopened, completely new. I am shipping from the UK - shipping costs will depend on your location.
Puzzle Strike Shadows English first edition Publisher: Sirlin Games
